title: How to reshape a polygon on a curve shape on a road in QGIS (QGIS, GIS) - Quora

response.answer_text: There's a tool for it, it is called the vertex tool. Your toggle editing tool must be on and the shapefile yo want to edit must be highlighted. Then the next step is to double click on the line or polygon you want to edit. you can create as many vertexes as you want.
